channel.title: (Hyperion) VyrezScape Dev Log (RS 2007 Remake)
channel.description:
Well hello guys yes this is another remake lets hope its not a fail one lol. And the base is Hyperion mainly for the stability and its really flexible.
Anyways what iv'e been working on is combat and adding new weapon's plus special attacks to them also.
[code]*Fixed a few glitches *Added a skill base to start from *Added combat special attacks *Added Dark Bow/Anchor/Rune c'bow *Added Mage system *NPC/Player Clipping *Worked with the combat system fixed timers. *Special Attacks work perfect *Messed around with the client addded new dragons. *Added old classic prayer. *Added basic friend list[/code]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jxgkK.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/em6eR.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xj33n.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FKp51.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jl2Fb.png[/img]
I'm looking for a client developer if anyone is interested please PM me.
And also I will be uploading a video of the server shortly.

item.title: (Hyperion) VyrezScape Dev Log (RS 2007 Remake)

item.description:
@vyrez wrote:

Well hello guys yes this is another remake lets hope its not a fail one lol. And the base is Hyperion mainly for the stability and its really flexible.

Anyways what iv’e been working on is combat and adding new weapon’s plus special attacks to them also.

*Fixed a few glitches *Added a skill base to start from *Added combat special attacks *Added Dark Bow/Anchor/Rune c'bow *Added Mage system *NPC/Player Clipping *Worked with the combat system fixed timers. *Special Attacks work perfect *Messed around with the client addded new dragons. *Added old classic prayer. *Added basic friend list





I’m looking for a client developer if anyone is interested please PM me.

And also I will be uploading a video of the server shortly.
